item.description:
Blue Valentine is the story of love found and love lost told in moments past and present. This honest and moving portrait follows Ryan Gosling and Michelle Williams who star as Dean and Cindy, a married couple who spend a night away from their daughter in an attempt to save their failing marriage. Juxtaposed with playful scenes that trace their romantic courtship six years prior, Gosling and Williams journey through the brutal heartbreak that comes with fading love and broken promises.

Blue Valentine Trailer

Blue Valentine is the film I was born to make - Writer/Director Derek Dianfrance

TOMATOMETER: 91

Shown at the Coolidge during Talk Cinema, Blue Valentine garnered rave reviews from our members.

Following the film, we'll go to a nearby favorite (Friendly Toast? CBC? Tommy Doyle's? Think Tank?) for fun and lively Saturday Night discussion.

See you at the movie,

John
item.how_to_find_us: John will be holding a Red, not Blue, Meetup Sign to gather the group following the film in the lobby outside the theater AFTER the close of credits. John will also send an email the night before to confirm Meetup and discussion plans.
item.name: BLUE VALENTINE
